Expected results:

It should normally switch between windows.

comments.raw_text:
Sounds like another (modal or otherwise) window is getting set behind the window you are looking at.

Just experienced that the other day with a plugin opening a small window, prompting for registration.  That window opened behind the browser window itself, thwarting attempts to close or whatnot.

Minimizing individual windows will often reveal stuff like that, allowing you to access the dialog in question, thereby freeing up the "locked" windows.


(This is where I ran into it, "Installing crescendo plugin")
http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=40&t=2323133
